verses.verse: וַיַּ֗עַל <WH5927> came up נָחָשׁ֙ <WH5176> Then Nahash הָֽעַמּוֹנִ֔י <WH5984> the Ammonite וַיִּ֖חַן <WH2583> and encamped עַל־ <WH5921> of יָבֵ֣שׁ <WH3003> of Jabesh גִּלְעָ֑ד <WH1568> Gilead וַיֹּ֨אמְר֜וּ <WH559> said כָּל־ <WH3605> and all אַנְשֵׁ֤י <WH376> the men יָבֵישׁ֙ <WH3003> of Jabesh אֶל־ <WH413> to נָחָ֔שׁ <WH5176> unto Nahash כְּרָת־ <WH3772> Make לָ֥נוּ בְרִ֖ית <WH1285> a covenant וְנַעַבְדֶֽךָּ׃ <WH5647> with us and we will serve

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> answered אֲלֵיהֶ֗ם <WH413> But נָחָשׁ֙ <WH5176> And Nahash הָעַמּוֹנִ֔י <WH5984> the Ammonite בְּזֹאת֙ <WH2063> them On this אֶכְרֹ֣ת <WH3772> [condition] will I make לָכֶ֔ם בִּנְק֥וֹר <WH5365> [a covenant] with you that I may thrust out לָכֶ֖ם כָּל־ <WH3605> of every עֵ֣ין <WH5869> eyes יָמִ֑ין <WH3225> all your right וְשַׂמְתִּ֥יהָ <WH7760> and lay חֶרְפָּ֖ה <WH2781> it [for] a reproach עַל־ <WH5921> and כָּל־ <WH3605> one יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> upon all Israel

וַיֹּאמְר֨וּ <WH559> said אֵלָ֜יו <WH413> about זִקְנֵ֣י <WH2205> And the elders יָבֵ֗ישׁ <WH3003> of Jabesh הֶ֤רֶף <WH7503> respite לָ֙נוּ֙ שִׁבְעַ֣ת <WH7651> unto him Give us seven יָמִ֔ים <WH3117> days' וְנִשְׁלְחָה֙ <WH7971> that we may send מַלְאָכִ֔ים <WH4397> messengers בְּכֹ֖ל <WH3605> throughout גְּב֣וּל <WH1366> unto all the coasts יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel וְאִם־ <WH518> if אֵ֥ין <WH369> there מוֹשִׁ֛יעַ <WH3467> and then if [there be] no man to save אֹתָ֖נוּ <WH853> וְיָצָ֥אנוּ <WH3318> us we will come out אֵלֶֽיךָ׃ <WH413> about

וַיָּבֹ֤אוּ <WH935> Then came הַמַּלְאָכִים֙ <WH4397> the messengers גִּבְעַ֣ת <WH1390> to Gibeah שָׁא֔וּל <WH7586> of Saul וַיְדַבְּר֥וּ <WH1696> and told הַדְּבָרִ֖ים <WH1697> the tidings בְּאָזְנֵ֣י <WH241> in the ears הָעָ֑ם <WH5971> of the people וַיִּשְׂא֧וּ <WH5375> lifted up כָל־ <WH3605> and all הָעָ֛ם <WH5971> and all the people אֶת־ <WH853> קוֹלָ֖ם <WH6963> their voices וַיִּבְכּֽוּ׃ <WH1058> and wept

וְהִנֵּ֣ה <WH2009> now behold שָׁא֗וּל <WH7586> And behold Saul בָּ֣א <WH935> came אַחֲרֵ֤י <WH310> after הַבָּקָר֙ <WH1241> the herd מִן־ <WH4480> from הַשָּׂדֶ֔ה <WH7704> out of the field וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said שָׁא֔וּל <WH7586> and Saul מַה־ <WH4100> What לָּעָ֖ם <WH5971> What [aileth] the people כִּ֣י <WH3588> for יִבְכּ֑וּ <WH1058> that they weep וַיְסַ֨פְּרוּ־ <WH5608> ? And they told ל֔וֹ אֶת־ <WH853> דִּבְרֵ֖י <WH1697> him the tidings אַנְשֵׁ֥י <WH582> of the men יָבֵֽישׁ׃ <WH3003> of Jabesh

וַתִּצְלַ֤ח <WH6743> came רֽוּחַ־ <WH7307> And the Spirit אֱלֹהִים֙ <WH430> of God עַל־ <WH5921> upon שָׁא֔וּל <WH7586> upon Saul [בְּשָׁמְעֹו כ] (כְּשָׁמְעֹ֖ו <WH8085> listen ק) אֶת־ <WH853> הַדְּבָרִ֣ים <WH1697> those tidings הָאֵ֑לֶּה <WH428> these וַיִּ֥חַר <WH2734> was kindled אַפּ֖וֹ <WH639> and his anger מְאֹֽד׃ <WH3966> greatly

וַיִּקַּח֩ <WH3947> And he took צֶ֨מֶד <WH6776> a yoke בָּקָ֜ר <WH1241> of oxen וַֽיְנַתְּחֵ֗הוּ <WH5408> and hewed them in pieces וַיְשַׁלַּ֞ח <WH7971> and sent בְּכָל־ <WH3605> throughout גְּב֣וּל <WH1366> [them] throughout all the coasts יִשְׂרָאֵל֮ <WH3478> of Israel בְּיַ֣ד <WH3027> by the hands הַמַּלְאָכִ֣ים ׀ <WH4397> of messengers לֵאמֹר֒ <WH559> saying אֲשֶׁר֩ <WH834> Whoever אֵינֶ֨נּוּ <WH369> does not יֹצֵ֜א <WH3318> Whosoever cometh not forth אַחֲרֵ֤י <WH310> after שָׁאוּל֙ <WH7586> Saul וְאַחַ֣ר <WH310> and after שְׁמוּאֵ֔ל <WH8050> Samuel כֹּ֥ה <WH3541> so יֵעָשֶׂ֖ה <WH6213> so shall it be done לִבְקָר֑וֹ <WH1241> unto his oxen וַיִּפֹּ֤ל <WH5307> fell פַּֽחַד־ <WH6343> And the fear יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> of the LORD עַל־ <WH5921> on הָעָ֔ם <WH5971> on the people וַיֵּצְא֖וּ <WH3318> and they came out כְּאִ֥ישׁ <WH376> consent אֶחָֽד׃ <WH259> with one

וַֽיִּפְקְדֵ֖ם <WH6485> And when he numbered בְּבָ֑זֶק <WH966> them in Bezek וַיִּהְי֤וּ <WH1961> become בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> of Israel שְׁלֹ֣שׁ <WH7969> were three מֵא֣וֹת <WH3967> hundred אֶ֔לֶף <WH505> thousand וְאִ֥ישׁ <WH376> and the men יְהוּדָ֖ה <WH3063> of Judah שְׁלֹשִׁ֥ים <WH7970> thirty אָֽלֶף׃ <WH505> thousand

וַיֹּאמְר֞וּ <WH559> And they said לַמַּלְאָכִ֣ים <WH4397> unto the messengers הַבָּאִ֗ים <WH935> that came כֹּ֤ה <WH3541> Thus תֹֽאמְרוּן֙ <WH559> Thus shall ye say לְאִישׁ֙ <WH376> unto the men יָבֵ֣ישׁ <WH3003> of Jabesh גִּלְעָ֔ד <WH1568> Gilead מָחָ֛ר <WH4279> To morrow תִּהְיֶֽה־ <WH1961> will have לָכֶ֥ם תְּשׁוּעָ֖ה <WH8668> ye shall have help [בְּחֹם כ] (כְּחֹ֣ם <WH2527> heat ק) הַשָּׁ֑מֶשׁ <WH8121> by [that time] the sun וַיָּבֹ֣אוּ <WH935> came הַמַּלְאָכִ֗ים <WH4397> And the messengers וַיַּגִּ֛ידוּ <WH5046> and shewed לְאַנְשֵׁ֥י <WH376> the men יָבֵ֖ישׁ <WH3003> of Jabesh וַיִּשְׂמָֽחוּ׃ <WH8055> and they were glad

וַֽיֹּאמְרוּ֙ <WH559> said אַנְשֵׁ֣י <WH582> Therefore the men יָבֵ֔ישׁ <WH3003> of Jabesh מָחָ֖ר <WH4279> To morrow נֵצֵ֣א <WH3318> we will come out אֲלֵיכֶ֑ם <WH413> to וַעֲשִׂיתֶ֣ם <WH6213> unto you and ye shall do לָּ֔נוּ כְּכָל־ <WH3605> whatever הַטּ֖וֹב <WH2896> good בְּעֵינֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH5869> with us all that seemeth ס

וַיְהִ֣י <WH1961> become מִֽמָּחֳרָ֗ת <WH4283> And it was [so] on the morrow וַיָּ֨שֶׂם <WH7760> put שָׁא֣וּל <WH7586> that Saul אֶת־ <WH853> הָעָם֮ <WH5971> the people שְׁלֹשָׁ֣ה <WH7969> in three רָאשִׁים֒ <WH7218> companies וַיָּבֹ֤אוּ <WH935> and they came בְתוֹךְ־ <WH8432> into the midst הַֽמַּחֲנֶה֙ <WH4264> of the host בְּאַשְׁמֹ֣רֶת <WH821> watch הַבֹּ֔קֶר <WH1242> in the morning וַיַּכּ֥וּ <WH5221> and slew אֶת־ <WH853> עַמּ֖וֹן <WH5983> the Ammonites עַד־ <WH5704> until חֹ֣ם <WH2527> until the heat הַיּ֑וֹם <WH3117> of the day וַיְהִ֤י <WH1961> become הַנִּשְׁאָרִים֙ <WH7604> and it came to pass that they which remained וַיָּפֻ֔צוּ <WH6327> were scattered וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> no נִשְׁאֲרוּ־ <WH7604> of them were not left בָ֖ם שְׁנַ֥יִם <WH8147> so that two יָֽחַד׃ <WH3162> together

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said הָעָם֙ <WH5971> And the people אֶל־ <WH413> to שְׁמוּאֵ֔ל <WH8050> unto Samuel מִ֣י <WH4310> Who הָאֹמֵ֔ר <WH559> Who [is] he that said שָׁא֖וּל <WH7586> Shall Saul יִמְלֹ֣ךְ <WH4427> reign עָלֵ֑ינוּ <WH5921> over תְּנ֥וּ <WH5414> over us? bring הָאֲנָשִׁ֖ים <WH376> the men וּנְמִיתֵֽם׃ <WH4191> that we may put them to death

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said שָׁא֔וּל <WH7586> And Saul לֹֽא־ <WH3808> not יוּמַ֥ת <WH4191> be put to death אִ֖ישׁ <WH376> There shall not a man בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> this day הַזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> this כִּ֥י <WH3588> for הַיּ֛וֹם <WH3117> for to day עָשָֽׂה־ <WH6213> hath wrought יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> the LORD תְּשׁוּעָ֖ה <WH8668> salvation בְּיִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> in Israel ס

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> Then said שְׁמוּאֵל֙ <WH8050> Samuel אֶל־ <WH413> to הָעָ֔ם <WH5971> to the people לְכ֖וּ <WH1980> Come וְנֵלְכָ֣ה <WH1980> go הַגִּלְגָּ֑ל <WH1537> to Gilgal וּנְחַדֵּ֥שׁ <WH2318> and renew שָׁ֖ם <WH8033> there הַמְּלוּכָֽה׃ <WH4410> the kingdom

וַיֵּלְכ֨וּ <WH1980> went כָל־ <WH3605> all הָעָ֜ם <WH5971> And all the people הַגִּלְגָּ֗ל <WH1537> to Gilgal וַיַּמְלִכוּ֩ <WH4427> king שָׁ֨ם <WH8033> and there אֶת־ <WH853> שָׁא֜וּל <WH7586> and there they made Saul לִפְנֵ֤י <WH6440> before יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> the LORD בַּגִּלְגָּ֔ל <WH1537> in Gilgal וַיִּזְבְּחוּ־ <WH2076> and there they sacrificed שָׁ֛ם <WH8033> There זְבָחִ֥ים <WH2077> sacrifices שְׁלָמִ֖ים <WH8002> of peace offerings לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD וַיִּשְׂמַ֨ח <WH8055> rejoiced שָׁ֥ם <WH8033> and there שָׁא֛וּל <WH7586> and there Saul וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all אַנְשֵׁ֥י <WH376> the men יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel עַד־ <WH5704> against מְאֹֽד׃ <WH3966> greatly פ
